text: John Busby Armstrong (23 September 1890 – 13 December 1950) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1950 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Gateshead Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Shildon A.F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Armstrong (footballer, born 1890)
